fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Icy Wind: Roleblock a player. **Locked**: In addition, they will be covered in frost, causing them to take a Basic Attack on the next night if they are not visited at least twice.
- Cold Shoulder (2-shot): Target another Beast and choose a list of up to 5 roles. If any of those roles visited the targeted Beast, you will roleblock them. **Locked**: In addition, you may select 1 role to deal a Basic Attack to.
- Icicle Spear (**Locked**, 2-shot): Deal a Basic Attack to a player. If they survive, they will be Frozen- roleblocked every night until they receive a total of four visits.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players killed by you or your frost will appear as **Frozen by Frigit**
- Players covered in frost will know they were covered in frost.
- **Locked**: You have a one-use Basic autovest.
-**Unlock Condition**: If it is December or it is snowing in your current location, **Unlock.**
